systemRequirementsSection:
•	Microsoft Azure Local with disconnected operations API. You need to have Microsoft Azure Local with the corresponding API installed.
•	Operations Manager 2016 or later. You need to have an Operations Manager 2016 or later environment installed external to Microsoft Azure Local.
•	Microsoft Azure Connection. The management server requires communication with Microsoft Azure. In this case, the workstation with the Operations Manager console, which will be used to configure Azure Local monitoring, must have connection to the Internet during the initial configuration process.
•	.NET framework 4.6.2 or later. All management servers in your management server pool and the workstation with the Operations Manager console must have .NET framework 4.6.2 or later installed. 
•	Azure Local with disconnected operations SSL certificate. The same SSL certificate must be installed in the Trusted Root Certificate Authority Store on the computer with the management pack installed, that was provided for the Microsoft Azure Local deployment.
•	Service Principal. The SPN that will be used in the MP should be created.
•	Azure Local with disconnected operations resource that is going to be monitored.
